Package camzup.pfriendly

Interface ICamEntity

All Known Implementing Classes:
CamEntity2, CamEntity3
public interface ICamEntity
Maintains consistent behavior between camera entities.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default ICamEntity frustum​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float near, float far)
    Sets a renderer projection matrix to the frustum defined by the edges of the view port.
    default ICamEntity ortho​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr)
    Sets a renderer projection to orthographic, where objects maintain their size regardless of distance from the camera.
    default ICamEntity ortho​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, float left, float right, float bottom, float top)
    Sets a renderer projection to orthographic, where objects maintain their size regardless of distance from the camera.
    default ICamEntity ortho​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float near, float far)
    Sets a renderer projection to orthographic, where objects maintain their size regardless of distance from the camera.
    default ICamEntity perspective​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr)
    Sets a renderer projection to a perspective, where objects nearer to the camera appear larger than objects distant from the camera.
    default ICamEntity perspective​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, float fov)
    Sets a renderer projection to a perspective, where objects nearer to the camera appear larger than objects distant from the camera.
    default ICamEntity perspective​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, float fov, float aspect)
    Sets a renderer projection to a perspective, where objects nearer to the camera appear larger than objects distant from the camera.
    default ICamEntity perspective​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, float fov, float aspect, float near, float far)
    Sets a renderer projection to a perspective, where objects nearer to the camera appear larger than objects distant from the camera.

  • Method Details

    • frustum

      default ICamEntity frustum​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float near, float far)
      Sets a renderer projection matrix to the frustum defined by the edges of the view port.
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      left - the left edge of the window
      right - the right edge of the window
      bottom - the bottom edge of the window
      top - the top edge of the window
      near - the near clip plane
      far - the far clip plane
      Returns:
      this entity

    • ortho

      default ICamEntity ortho​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr)
      Sets a renderer projection to orthographic, where objects maintain their size regardless of distance from the camera.
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      Returns:
      this entity

      Parameters:

      default ICamEntity perspective​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr)
      Sets a renderer projection to a perspective, where objects nearer to the camera appear larger than objects distant from the camera.

      Returns:

    • perspective

      default ICamEntity perspective​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, float fov)
      Sets a renderer projection to a perspective, where objects nearer to the camera appear larger than objects distant from the camera.
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      fov - the field of view
      Returns:
      this entity

    • perspective

      default ICamEntity perspective​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, float fov, float aspect)
      Sets a renderer projection to a perspective, where objects nearer to the camera appear larger than objects distant from the camera.
      Parameters:
      rndr - the renderer
      fov - the field of view
      aspect - the aspect ratio, width over height
      Returns:
      this entity
